settings.title: Pre Sale Questions
settings.question_1: Q: What type of silver is used in your jewelry?
settings.answer_1: We use sterling silver for our jewelry, which is 92.5% pure silver alloyed with other metals for strength and durability.
settings.answer_2: Yes, we are committed to ethical sourcing practices. Our diamonds are obtained from reputable suppliers who adhere to the Kimberley Process, ensuring they are conflict-free.
settings.question_3: Q: What is the quality of your diamonds?
settings.answer_3: We use diamonds that meet a minimum standard of clarity and color. Each diamond is carefully selected to ensure brilliance and sparkle in our jewelry pieces.
settings.question_4: Q: Do you offer certifications for your diamonds?
settings.answer_4: Upon request, we can provide certificates of authenticity and grading for the diamonds used in our jewelry, detailing their quality and characteristics.
settings.question_5: Q:  How should I care for my silver diamond jewelry?
settings.answer_5: To maintain the beauty of your jewelry, we recommend storing it in a dry, airtight container when not in use and avoiding exposure to chemicals, perfumes, and cosmetics. Clean it regularly with a soft cloth or a jewelry cleaning solution specifically designed for silver and diamonds.
settings.question_6: Q: Can I customize the jewelry or request a specific design?
settings.answer_6: We offer customization services for certain pieces, including personalized engravings or modifications to existing designs. Please contact us to discuss your specific requirements.
settings.question_7: Q: How can I contact customer support?
settings.answer_7: You can reach our customer support team via email at contact@vanikajewels.com or by whatsapp at +91-73591-81221. Our representatives are available to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have.
